prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Promptbook is a tool that allows users to write software specifications in plain English, which are then translated into working code. This approach aims to make programming more accessible to non-technical users.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: English to Code: Promptbook Simplifies Programming
